Others: The article discusses injuries to several Bangladesh players during the match, including Soumya Sarkar, Jaker Ali, Mustafizur Rahman, Mushfiqur Rahim, and Anamul Haque.
Tanzid Hasan was brought in as a concussion substitute for Soumya Sarkar.
The article also mentions that Richard Kettleborough, the on-field umpire, opted to stay away due to the extreme heat, with Tanvir Ahmed taking his place.
